bad_kind = ['quicksort']
with pytest.raises(TypeError):
    gsp.bubble_neighbors(self.centres, distance_upper_bound=self.
        upper_radii, sorted=self.sorted, kind=bad_kind)
bad_kind = 'quick_sort'
with pytest.raises(ValueError):
    gsp.bubble_neighbors(self.centres, distance_upper_bound=self.
        upper_radii, sorted=self.sorted, kind=bad_kind)
